title: Former U.N. Envoy To Syria: Iran Has 'Too Much Influence In The Region'
teaser: Veteran diplomat Lakhdar Brahimi has taken on tough gigs, but being an envoy to Syria during the civil war topped them all. He now works with The Elders, a group of global leaders working for peace.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
